org.cougaar.mts.jms
Class ReplySync

java.lang.Object
  org.cougaar.mts.jms.ReplySync

public class ReplySync
extends java.lang.Object

This utility class does the low-level work to force the jms linkprotocol to behave like a synchronous rpc. In particular it blocks the sending thread until a reply for the outgoing message arrives, generates and sends replies for incoming messages, and processes received replies by waking the corresponding thread.
